data.title: Early Round Haystack Turret
data.description: Place this Turret at the start of the round to spot for any Mid aggression.

data.title: Safe Spawn Turret For Garage
data.description: This is a good start round Turret to use to punish any aggressive Defender for overextending. This spots all aggressive pushes, except for Window.

data.title: Sewers Lockdown For A Site
data.description: Here's a strong Lockdown placement that allows for an easy A Site take. There will be two gaps though when using this ult, the right side of Heaven and Hell. Nonetheless, it effectively isolates the Defenders.

data.title: A Site Turret + Flank Alarmbot
data.description: A good Turret to place to watch both Defender Spawn entrance and A Heaven window with an added Alarmbot to watch flank.

data.title: Back A Site Nanoswarm Grenades
data.description: A good set of Nanoswarm grenades to push Defenders out from behind A Site.

data.title: Grass to Garage Doors Nanoswarm
data.description: This Nanoswarm lineup is useful for clearing out players playing directly in the corner directly left of the Garage Doors as you come into Garage.

data.title: A Garden To Front B Site Nanoswarm
data.description: This Nanoswarm lineup is useful post plant, for stopping players from defusing the Spike on the front of B Site.

data.title: C Long To Left Side of C Default Nanoswarm
data.description: This Nanoswarm lineup is useful for stopping players from defusing the Spike on the left side of C Default.

data.title: A Garden Turret For Attacker Side Spawn
data.description: This turret lineup is useful for alerting you of players flanking from Mid Courtyard, A Lobby, and C Lobby.
